value.title: StarCraft 2: GREAT SERIES - Serral vs Maru! (Best-of-5)
value.excerpt: A best-of-5 series between the best players that StarCraft 2 has to offer. In this video I cast a Zerg versus Terran in SC2 between Serral, the current World Champion of StarCraft, and Maru, the most succesful player from South Korea. value.title: StarCraft 2: PROFESSIONAL 2v2?! (Maru & sOs vs MaxPax & souL)
value.excerpt: The standard competitive mode in StarCraft 2 is 1v1. However the OlimoLeague recently put on an event where they invited three teams of progamers to face off in a 2v2 (2 vs 2) event. In this video I cast a best-of-5 between Maru and sOs on one team, and MaxPax and souL on the other.  OlimoLeague on Patreon:

value.title: StarCraft 2: GAME OF THE YEAR! (So Far)
value.excerpt: Goblin versus Krystianer in an epic game of professional StarCraft 2. It's a bit early to call it the best game of SC2 of this year already, but it surely is the best so far. In this Protoss versus Protoss neither player ever manages to secure a solid economy so an intense micro battle is the only option.

value.title: StarCraft 2: EPIC GAME - Super Long Action-Packed Pro Match! (Elazer vs Nice)
